headline: ADM Reviews Earnings in Latest Step to Fix Accounting Issues
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Archer-Daniels-Midland Co. restated previous earnings, after earlier this month identifying new accounting errors, in a key step to regain investor confidence. summary: The headline numbers for ADM (ADM) give insight into how the company performed in the quarter ended September 2024, but it may be worthwhile to compare some of its key metrics to Wall Street estimates and the year-ago actuals.

headline: Archer Daniels Midland (ADM) Lags Q3 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: ADM (ADM) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -13.49% and 3.36%, respectively, for the quarter ended September 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Archer Daniels Midland Profit Plunges, Revenue Falls
summary: Archer Daniels Midland said profit plunged in the third quarter, shortly after saying it would restate its 2023 filing with the Securities Exchange Commission, along with the first and second quarter forms.

raw.headline: Archer Daniels Midland Profit Plunges, Revenue Falls

headline: ADM: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
summary: The results did not meet Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.26 per share. The agribusiness giant posted revenue of $19.94 billion in the period, which also fell short of Street forecasts.

raw.headline: ADM: Q3 Earnings Snapshot
raw.summary: The results did not meet Wall Street expectations. The average estimate of four analysts surveyed by Zacks Investment Research was for earnings of $1.26 per share. The agribusiness giant posted revenue of $19.94 billion in the period, which also fell short of Street forecasts.

headline: ADM Reports Third Quarter 2024 Results
summary: CHICAGO, November 18, 2024--ADM (NYSE: ADM) today reported financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2024 that are consistent with its previously announced preliminary results, and also filed its third quarter form 10-Q. The Company also filed its restated financial statements in its fiscal year 2023 Form 10-K and its forms 10-Q for the first and second quarters of 2024. headline: ADM's Q3 earnings fall, report delayed after more accounting errors found
summary: (Reuters) -Global grain trader Archer-Daniels-Midland reported lower third-quarter profits on Monday due to weakness in its grain business, an announcement delayed by the need to correct irregularities in accounts of its operating units.  Prices for staple crops like corn and soybeans have slid to near four-year lows, hurting ADM's profits and margins, especially in its grain origination and crushing business.  Further accounting irregularities surfaced more recently, and the Chicago-based company on Nov. 5 delayed its earnings release so it could amend financial statements for 2023 and the first two quarters of 2024.

raw.headline: ADM's Q3 earnings fall, report delayed after more accounting errors found

Prices for staple crops like corn and soybeans have slid to near four-year lows, hurting ADM's profits and margins, especially in its grain origination and crushing business.  Further accounting irregularities surfaced more recently, and the Chicago-based company on Nov. 5 delayed its earnings release so it could amend financial statements for 2023 and the first two quarters of 2024.

headline: 3 US Dividend Stocks To Enhance Your Portfolio
summary: As the U.S. stock market experiences fluctuations, with major indexes recording weekly losses amid a tech sector slump and cautious Federal Reserve policies, investors are increasingly seeking stability through dividend stocks. In such volatile times, dividend-paying stocks can offer a reliable income stream and potential for capital appreciation, making them an attractive option for enhancing your portfolio.
